ygData.subject: Hollow Skull
ygData.msgSnippet: If anybody knows where I can find a hollow skull, please let me know.  If you can isolate it down to a specific loc in a specific zone, that would be best.
ygData.messageBody:
If anybody knows where I can find a hollow skull, please let me know. If
you can isolate it down to a specific loc in a specific zone, that would be
best. The hollow skull when combined with two rubies (one from the high
shaman in Splitpaw and one from Lyunga in Innothule swamp) supposedly makes
a jeweled skull. Supposedly Yiz Pon in W.Karana says he is being followed
by a gnoll assassin who soon appears after you talk to him and supposedly
the skull is found on the gnoll assassin. The jeweled skull is supposedly
+5 int +20 mana +20 hp -5 cold resistance.

Thanks in advance
Mark Mazurik
